name: Bodysuit with appliqued hedgehog, Size S
description:
This bodysuit is made from 100% combed cotton and has a three snap closure at the bottom.

Each bodysuit has been hand dyed individually.

The designs are cut out by hand and hand appliqued. The appliques are made from Eco-Felt which is made from recycled plastic bottles.

The bodysuit is finished on the inside with soft interface backing and can be machine washed. Care instructions are included.

Size S   3-6 Months    13-18 Lbs.

name: Red linen pillow with elephant felt applique
description:
Each design is cut out by hand and hand appliqued.

The appliques are made from Eco-Felt which is made from recycled plastic bottles.

Each design is finished on the inside with interface backing.

The pillow cover is hand made (so size may vary slightly), made from 100% linen and has a zipper at the bottom.

Each cover is pre-washed.

Pillow cover fits a standard 16"x16" insert.

Care instructions are included.
